title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Community Health Simulation-Based Learning for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can assess the complex needs of community patients through VR simulations.
Learners can apply a holistic care approach to establish patient-nurse relationships in a simulated environment.
Participants can analyze experts' decision-making processes in community nursing settings and autonomously plan nursing care.
Students can develop and implement chronic disease management education strategies through VR-based case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
